articles.title: Almost all of these virus patients die - Tweed Daily News
articles.description: The results of a new hospital study show that when critically ill patients are put on ventilators it is highly unlikely they will survive.
articles.content:
New research shows that critically ill coronavirus patients who are put on ventilators have a very poor chance of surviving.
